name: Black Diamant Pocket Tee - Superior Roots Line
description: This custom sewn pocket tee by Remember Your Roots on 100% USDA Certified Organic Cotton, is the softest cotton tee you'll ever own. We'll also pick up 3 pounds of waste out of our waterways for each one sold! This custom sewn pocket tee by Remember Your Roots on 100% USDA Certified Organic Cotton, is the softest cotton tee you'll ever own. We'll also pick up 3 pounds of waste out of our waterways for each one sold! Color: Black 100% Organic Fine Jersey cotton shirt. Made in the USA. Diamond Print sewn cotton pocket. Remember Your Roots Tagless Label. *These shirts are produced on demand. Please allow an additional 1-3 days for customization prior to shipping.* Shipping Policy: Shipping within the US is always free. Shipping to Canada is determined by your order size and weight. Please note that additional Customs fees and taxes may be applied upon delivery. All orders are sent via USPS First Class. Domestic orders generally arrive within 3-5 business days. International orders may take up to 14 business days.

name: RastaRoots Redux Organic Tee - Superior Roots Line
description: The RastaRoots Redux is the debut of our Superior Roots Line. For each product sold under the Superior Roots line, we will triple our waste collection efforts (3 pounds of trash removed from waterways and the ocean!). This tee is 100% certified organic combed ring spun cotton. Color: Black Pre-shrunk 4.5 oz. 100% certified organic combed ring spun cotton. Fashion fit. Certified under Oeko-Tex® Standard 100. name: L'Artiste Roots Sustainable Zip Hoodie
description: This original sustainable zip hoodie from Remember Your Roots features the IamRYR branding and logo on the front, with a fresh new logo on the back. This environmentally-inspired design resembles two crashing waves breaking away from each other forming the RYR logo, symbolizing the past, present, and future... where are you headed? name: "Fear is a Lie" - Skate Deck - Natural
description: Our good friend, artist Corinne Weidmann, is credited with the design and inspiration behind this board. The artwork includes elements of South American and Swiss design. The frog represents our eco-friendly initiative, as the frog lives on land, in water, and in trees. "Fear is a Lie" expresses the belief to not be intimidated by obstacles set in your path. Follow your own path and be your own person. Remember Your Roots. Designed by Corinne Weidmann - Iuna Tinta - Please view more of her designs online at www.iuna.ch. Product Details: - Hand-made in USA - Huntington Beach, CA - 7-ply Canadian Maple - Graphic background may vary due to grain of natural wood - Mellow concave, tapered tail - We offer 2 sizes: 7.75" and 8.0" *All boards come with a roll of grip tape. We do not apply grip tape prior to shipping.* Shipping Policy: Shipping within the US is always free. Shipping to Canada is determined by your order size and weight. Please note that additional Customs fees and taxes may be applied upon delivery. All orders are sent via USPS First Class. Domestic orders generally arrive within 3-5 business days. International orders may take up to 14 business days.
